experience: You and Mayank both know Ed Nusbaum, Chase Norlin, and 100 others

Microchip Technology Inc. is a leading provider of microcontroller and analog semiconductors, providing low-risk product development, lower total system cost and faster time to market for thousands of diverse customer applications worldwide.I work with the MCU8 Applications New Product Development group.

maxEmbedded is a platform to share knowledge and learn about the basic concepts of robotics, embedded systems and computer vision.I started maxEmbedded to provide high quality tutorials on the basics of embedded systems and robotics for students, makers and hobbyists.Visit: http://maxEmbedded.com/

European Innovation Academy (EIA) is the world's largest summer entrepreneurial program for students. More than 500 students from all over the world gather in Nice, France and Turin, Italy to get once-a-lifetime entrepreneurial experience. There's a great network on mentors, investors, VCs from US/Europe along with industry partners like Google and IBM, who come together to help the students build their idea and market it.I am working with Arizona State University to promote EIA to local hackers, hustlers, hipsters. Interested? Ask me about my experience at EIA 2015.

The Talent Network is an online talent discovery platform. It makes it easier and faster for tech companies to discover and hire entry level software developers. It consists of a database of vetted developers and designers that any company can search through based on the skills they need and find the right candidate to interview in minutes.I started The Talent Network because I believe that the challenge of finding the right talent should not be one. There should be a better way for next generation entrepreneurs to get connected to next generation talent.

Worked at the Fulton Tutoring Center of the School of Computing, Informatics and Decision Systems Engineering, one of the Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University.As a lead tutor, my role was to maintain the facility, lead and manage other tutors, and facilitating communication with the coordinator.

I have known Kristiina from the day I applied for European Innovation Academy's 2015 batch. She has done a great job in connecting and communicating with me and other participants, essentially serving all their needs and taking good care of students while they were there in France for EIA. She would help out every person in the best way possible to the best of her abilities. Her warm and friendly nature would encourage students and other participants to open up with her and have fun while they learn. She works with passion and all her heart and people love working with her.

July 9, 2014, Mayank reported directly to Kumar

Ever since I have joined and worked for roboVITics, I had the privilege of having Utkarsh as our mentor and advisor. Being the Founder President of the club, Utkarsh has always remained very close to the activities and the members of the club. His calm and compassionate nature made the club members frequently approach him for mentorship. His strong sense of judgement has ensured that the decisions taken within the club always have a positive outcome. While I was the President, I would always consult with Utkarsh before taking any decision or implementing any new idea. All these qualities make Utkarsh an excellent mentor and advisor of the club, which he continues to do so. My best wishes are with him.

summary: Mayank (Max) has a Masters in Computer Engineering from Arizona State University. He is an Applications Engineer at Microchip Technology. His work lies in the field of embedded systems, Internet of Things (IoT) and online marketing.Mayank is an entrepreneur. He is passionate about things that enrich people's lifestyle - like smart devices, health/wellness, and beauty/skin care products. He works with many successful leaders in the industry and helps like-minded individuals develop leadership skills and the right attitude and mindset for success.Mayank also serves as the VP Membership at PICMasters Toastmasters Club, a public speaking club at Microchip Technology. He mentors many club members and helps them develop confidence within themselves, their communication skills and leadership skills.He loves brainstorming with passionate and driven young entrepreneurs empowering them to be innovative, finding solutions to problems they want to solve, and helping them execute the plan.Outside of his professional world, Mayank also enjoys playing guitar and Latin ballroom dancing.
name: Mayank Prasad
title: Entrepreneur & Computer Engineer
